explanation: [0-0] A man squats in front of a TV, which is playing the animated movie "The Boss Baby." The man is wearing a blue hat, a yellow hoodie, and blue jeans. He's holding a Pikachu plush toy in his hand. There's a soccer ball by his feet. On the TV screen, a little boy in a black suit is standing in a room with a yellow toy next to him. Below the TV is a white TV stand, and behind it is a blue wall. There are white subtitles on the screen that read "Shorts@BoomBibo."
